GS39minsmaru:1: arddhaṃ nārīśarīraṃ hi yaś ca tasmai namo 'stu te // MinSd_1 //
GS39minsmaru:4: smaran nirjitya rudreṇa paścād uddīpitaḥ smaraḥ /
GS39minsmaru:8: prabodhāya varastrīṇāṃ tuṣṭyai ratisukhāya ca // MinSd_4 //
GS39minsmaru:11: bālikā taruṇī prauḍhā vṛddhā ceti viśeṣataḥ /
GS39minsmaru:12: jñātavyo hy anvitaḥ kāmo dhruvaṃ śṛṅgāram icchatā // MinSd_6 //
GS39minsmaru:14: kāmaśāstram ajānanto ramante paśuvat striyam // MinSd_7 //
GS39minsmaru:16: kiṃ saurabheyīśatamadhyavartī vṛṣo 'pi saṃbhogasukhaṃ na bhuṅkte // MinSd_8 //
GS39minsmaru:19: yena saṃvatsaro dṛṣṭaḥ sakṛt kāmaḥ susevitaḥ /
GS39minsmaru:20: tena sarvam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ punar āvartitaṃ jagat // MinSd_10 //
GS39minsmaru:21: prathamaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ puṃsāṃ strīṇāṃ ca tadanantaram /
GS39minsmaru:24: punaḥ ṣoḍaśa bandhāś ca tathaivādhomukhāś ca ṣaṭ // MinSd_12 //
GS39minsmaru:25: dvau bandhau sundarīṇāṃ ca paścān mukharataṃ tathā /
GS39minsmaru:26: bāhyaṃ rataṃ tataḥ kuryād rataṃ deśaviśeṣajam // MinSd_13 //
GS39minsmaru:29: śaśo mṛgo vṛṣaś caiva caturthas tu hayas tathā /
GS39minsmaru:30: kathayāmi kramāt puṃsām etaj jāticatuṣṭayam // MinSd_15 //
GS39minsmaru:31: mṛducapalasuśīlaḥ komalāṅgaḥ suveṣaḥ sakalaguṇanidhānaṃ satyavādī śaśo 'sau // MinSd_16 //
GS39minsmaru:35: ṣaḍaṅgulo bhaven meḍhraḥ śrīmāṃś ca śaśako mataḥ // MinSd_18 //
GS39minsmaru:36: vadati madhuravāṇīṃ raktanetraḥ suśīlaḥ calamatiratibhīruḥ śīghragāmī mṛgo 'sau // MinSd_19 //
GS39minsmaru:37: udarakaṭikṛśaḥ syād dīrghabimbādharauṣṭho daśanavadanadīrgho dīrghabāhuḥ pratāpī // MinSd_20 //
GS39minsmaru:39: aṣṭāṅgulo bhaven meḍhro rūpayukto mṛgo mataḥ // MinSd_21 //
GS39minsmaru:40: vṛṣo yathā udarakaṭikṛśāsyaḥ śīghragāmī natāṃsaḥ kanakaruciradehaḥ kaṣṭavādī vṛṣo 'sau // MinSd_22 //
GS39minsmaru:41: vyasanakṛpaṇabuddhiḥ strīvaśaḥ strīvilāso bahuguṇabahutejāḥ dīrghanetro 'bhimānī // MinSd_23 //
GS39minsmaru:43: lubdhaś ca kṛpaṇaś caiva mithyāvādī ca nirbhayaḥ /
GS39minsmaru:44: daśāṅgulaśarīras tu medasvī vṛṣabho mataḥ // MinSd_24 //
GS39minsmaru:47: lubdhaś ca kṛpaṇaś caiva mithyāvādī ca nirbhayaḥ // MinSd_26 //
GS39minsmaru:48: dvādaśāṅgulameḍhras tu kuśalo 'pi hayo mataḥ // MinSd_27 //
GS39minsmaru:51: padminī citriṇī caiva śaṅkhinī hastinī tathā /
GS39minsmaru:52: pratyekaṃ ca varastrīṇāṃ khyātaṃ jāticatuṣṭayam // MinSd_29 //
GS39minsmaru:53: padminī yathā bhavati kamalanetrā nāsikād ūrdhvarandhrā aviralakucayugmā dīrghakeśā kṛśāṅgī // MinSd_30 //
GS39minsmaru:54: mṛdugamanasuśīlā nṛtyagītānuraktā sakalaguṇasuveṣā padminī padmagandhā // MinSd_31 //
GS39minsmaru:58: svalpāhārā sukeśī ca padmagandhā ca padminī // MinSd_33 //
GS39minsmaru:59: citriṇī yathā bhavati vipulakeśā nātidīrghā na kharvā tilakusumasunāsā snigdhadehotpalākṣī // MinSd_34 //
GS39minsmaru:60: kaṭhinaghanakucāḍhyā sundarī bandhaśīlā nikhilaguṇavicitrā citriṇī citraveṣā // MinSd_35 //
GS39minsmaru:64: dhūrtā gurunitambā ca citriṇī śrīphalastanī // MinSd_37 //
GS39minsmaru:66: leṣātapālaṅkṛtakaṇṭhadeśā puṃsaikacittā khalu śaṅkhinī syāt // MinSd_38 //
GS39minsmaru:68: mṛdvaṅgī kṣāragandhā ca nātisthūlā na durbalā // MinSd_39 //
GS39minsmaru:70: viśālajaghanā krūrā suratāḍhyā ca śaṅkhinī // MinSd_40 //
GS39minsmaru:71: hastinī yathā sthūlākṛtiḥ sthūlapayodharā ca sthūlādharā sthūlanitambabimbā /
GS39minsmaru:72: kāmotsukā gāḍharatipriyā ca madhye ca puṣṭā kariṇī matā ca // MinSd_41 //
GS39minsmaru:76: kharvā ca kharvanāsā ca bahulomā ca kāmukī // MinSd_43 //
GS39minsmaru:78: lubdhā pīnastanī kruddhā hastinī sā prakīrtitā // MinSd_44 //
GS39minsmaru:79: padminī pikavāṇī ca snigdhavāṇī ca citriṇī /
GS39minsmaru:80: śaṅkhinī krūravāṇī ca meghavāṇī ca hastinī // MinSd_45 //
GS39minsmaru:81: padminī pādaśobhā ca keśaśobhā ca citriṇī /
GS39minsmaru:82: śaṅkhinī mukhaśobhā ca kaṭiśobhā ca hastinī // MinSd_46 //
GS39minsmaru:83: padminī padmagandhā ca kṣīragandhā ca citriṇī /
GS39minsmaru:84: śaṅkhinī mīnagandhā ca madagandhā ca hastinī // MinSd_47 //
GS39minsmaru:85: padminī padmanidrā ca dīrghanidrā ca citriṇī /
GS39minsmaru:86: śaṅkhinī ghoranidrā ca gajanidrā ca hastinī // MinSd_48 //
GS39minsmaru:89: padminī svalpabhogā ca laghubhogā ca citriṇī /
GS39minsmaru:90: śaṅkhinī bahubhogā ca gajabhogā ca hastinī // MinSd_50 //
GS39minsmaru:91: śaśakaḥ padminīṃ caiva citriṇīṃ ca mṛgas tathā // MinSd_51 //
GS39minsmaru:92: śaṅkhinīṃ vṛṣabhaś caiva hastinīṃ tu hayas tathā /
GS39minsmaru:93: ramate tulyabhāvena tadā samarataṃ bhavet // MinSd_52 //
GS39minsmaru:94: uccanīcātinīcaṃ ca tathātyuccaṃ ca varjitam // MinSd_53 //
GS39minsmaru:95: khyātaṃ samarataṃ caiva tad virahaty anyathā striyaḥ // MinSd_54 //
GS39minsmaru:99: sthūlaṃ musalam ity āhur dīrghaṃ tad raṅgavīrakam // MinSd_55 //
GS39minsmaru:101: kṣatraśīrṣe prasannaṃ ca liṅgāni syuḥ śubhāni ṣaṭ // MinSd_56 //
GS39minsmaru:104: alomā mṛduvistīrṇā ṣaḍ ete subhagā bhagāḥ // MinSd_57 //
GS39minsmaru:107: śītalaṃ sukhadaṃ proktam uṣṇaṃ ca madhyamaṃ smṛtam /
GS39minsmaru:108: atyuṣṇam asukhaṃ caiva kharaṃ prāṇaharaṃ smṛtam // MinSd_59 //
GS39minsmaru:110: aṅguṣṭhe caraṇe gulphe bhage nābhau kuce hṛdi /
GS39minsmaru:111: kakṣe kaṇṭhe 'dhare netre kapole ca śrutāv api /
GS39minsmaru:112: śīrṣe sarvaśarīre tu vaset kāmas tithikramāt // MinSd_60 //
GS39minsmaru:113: savye puṃsaḥ striyo vāme kṛṣṇe śukle viparyayaḥ /
GS39minsmaru:114: ūrddhvaṃ pratipadādau ca kṛṣṇe cādhaḥ pracakṣate // MinSd_61 //
GS39minsmaru:115: evaṃ caiva vaset kāmaḥ sthāne caiva viśeṣataḥ /
GS39minsmaru:116: pāde jaṅghe ūrudeśe stane kakṣe gale śrutau // MinSd_62 //
GS39minsmaru:117: nakhakṣataṃ pradātavyaṃ bhage nābhau ca mardanam /
GS39minsmaru:118: gaṇḍe netre lalāṭe ca cumbanaṃ kāmukair iha /
GS39minsmaru:120: ātmāsyenduśaradvisaptatithayaḥ khyātaṃ nalinyā rate paulastyābdhirasāṣṭabhāskaratithau prītā bhavec citriṇī /
GS39minsmaru:121: rudrānaṅgagaṇeśaśambhutithayaḥ syuḥ śaṅkhinībhuktaye śeṣāḥ syuḥ suratotsaveṣu kariṇāṃ jātāṃ striyaḥ prītaye // MinSd_64 //
GS39minsmaru:122: aṅguṣṭhe caraṇe ca gulphanicaye jānudvaye bāstike nābhau vakṣasi kakṣayor nigaditā kaṇṭhe kapole 'dhare /
GS39minsmaru:123: netre karṇayuge lalāṭaphalake dhautaṃ ca vāmabhruvām ūrdhvādhaścalanakrameṇa tithayaś cāndrīkalāpakṣaye // MinSd_65 //
GS39minsmaru:124: sīmante nayane 'dhare ca galake kakṣātaṭe cūcuke nābhau śroṇitaṭe manobhavagṛhe jaṅghātaṭe piṇḍake /
GS39minsmaru:125: gulphe pādatale tadaṅgulitale 'ṅguṣṭhe ca tiṣṭhaty asau vṛddhakṣīṇasamaṃ tadā śaśikalāpakṣadvaye yoṣitām // MinSd_66 //
GS39minsmaru:126: maulau kuntalakarṣaṇaṃ nayanayor ācumbanaṃ gaṇḍayoḥ dantenādharapīḍanaṃ hṛdi hatim muṣṭyā ca nābhau śanaiḥ /
GS39minsmaru:127: kakṣākaṇṭhakapolamaṇḍalakucaśroṇīṣu deyā nakhāḥ sīmante śikharaṃ nakhair urasijau gṛhṇīta gāḍhaṃ tataḥ // MinSd_67 //
GS39minsmaru:128: kurvāṇo viratiṃ manobhavagṛhe mātaṅgalīlāyitaṃ jānvaṅguṣṭhapadorugulphahananaṃ cānyonyataḥ kāminām /
GS39minsmaru:129: ity evaṃ gaditaṃ pradeśakalanād indoḥ kalāropaṇaṃ kartavyaṃ ca narais tu strīṣu rabhasād uktaḥ prabodhādhikaḥ // MinSd_68 //
GS39minsmaru:131: dravaty anena kāmo hi ghṛtabhāṇḍam ivāgninā // MinSd_69 //
GS39minsmaru:136: adhare gaṇḍayor bhāle kapole galake hṛdi /
GS39minsmaru:137: stane ca kakṣayor haste nābhimūle bhagasthale // MinSd_72 //
GS39minsmaru:138: kukṣau jaghanayor mūle hṛdayor netrayor mukhe /
GS39minsmaru:139: kaṭyāṃ ca cumbanaṃ dantakṣataṃ netre tu varjitam // MinSd_73 //
GS39minsmaru:140: bhage mardanam āpūrya tato maithunam ācaret /
GS39minsmaru:141: kṛtvā vivastrāṃ kāntāṃ tu meḍhraṃ tatra praveśayet // MinSd_74 //
GS39minsmaru:143: anyonyaṃ dṛḍham ākramya kuryād āliṅganaṃ striyaḥ // MinSd_75 //
GS39minsmaru:145: gāḍham āliṅganaṃ deyaṃ tatsakhyā hy anurāgataḥ // MinSd_76 //
GS39minsmaru:146: gale vakṣaḥsthale kukṣau kaṇṭhapārśve bhage tathā /
GS39minsmaru:147: jaghanorunitambeṣu pṛṣṭhe haste śiraḥsu ca // MinSd_77 //
GS39minsmaru:148: kaṇṭhamūle kapole ca nakhakṣatam athācaret // MinSd_78 //
GS39minsmaru:151: sthāneṣv eteṣu kukṣau ca nakhacāṭuṃ samācaret /
GS39minsmaru:153: itthaṃ ca manmathotpanne keliṃ kuryāt tathaiva ca /
GS39minsmaru:156: bhujayoḥ stanayoś caiva bhage nābhau tathaiva ca /
GS39minsmaru:157: ṣaṭsu sthāneṣu vidhinā mardanaṃ parikīrtitam // MinSd_83 //
GS39minsmaru:159: karṇamūle tathā skandhe cumbanaṃ dvādaśasthale // MinSd_84 //
GS39minsmaru:160: gaṇḍauṣṭhaṃ ca tathā vaktraṃ kakṣā nābhir bhagas tathā /
GS39minsmaru:161: kucau ca bāhumūlaṃ ca dvādaśaitāni cumbanam // MinSd_85 //
GS39minsmaru:162: gaṇḍau netre tathā vaktraṃ kakṣā nābhir bhagas tathā /
GS39minsmaru:163: kucau ca bāhumūlaṃ ca sthānāny etāni cumbane // MinSd_86 //
GS39minsmaru:165: pūrṇacandranibhaṃ peyān nāryāś ca sarasaṃ mukham // MinSd_87 //
GS39minsmaru:167: pañcasthānasya vai pānaṃ kuryāt kṛśavicakṣaṇaḥ // MinSd_88 //
GS39minsmaru:169: śiraḥpradeśe kṛtvā tām upaviṣṭāṃ ca kārayet // MinSd_89 //
GS39minsmaru:171: yathā haṃsamayūrādeḥ kalarāvaṃ tathā caret // MinSd_90 //
GS39minsmaru:176: marditā cāṅgulībhyāṃ tu janayet kāmajaṃ jalam // MinSd_92 //
GS39minsmaru:178_0: teṣāṃ nāmāni kākapadaḥ viparītakaḥ nāgarikaḥ ratipāśaḥ keyūraḥ priyatoṣaṇaṃ samapadaḥ
GS39minsmaru:178_1: ekapadaḥ ūrdhvasaṃpuṭaḥ saṃpuṭakaḥ manmathapriyaḥ ratisundaraḥ urupīḍanaḥ smaracakraṃ
GS39minsmaru:178_2: nāgapāśakaḥ gaganakaḥ vaṃśadārakaḥ kanakakṣayaḥ nāgaraḥ kuliśanāmakaḥ kāmasundara iti /
GS39minsmaru:180: strīpādau skandhayugmasthau kṣiptvā dhvajaṃ bhagaṃ laghu /
GS39minsmaru:181: kāmayet kāmuko nārīṃ bandhaḥ kākapado hi saḥ // MinSd_93 //
GS39minsmaru:182: pādam ekaṃ kare dhṛtvā dvitīyaṃ skandhasaṃsthitam /
GS39minsmaru:183: nārīṃ kāmayate kāmī bandhaḥ syād viparītakaḥ // MinSd_94 //
GS39minsmaru:185: grīvāṃ dhṛtvā karābhyāṃ tu bandho nāgariko mataḥ // MinSd_95 //
GS39minsmaru:187: ratipāśas tadā khyātaḥ kāminīnāṃ manoharaḥ // MinSd_96 //
GS39minsmaru:189: ramate vihvalaḥ kāmī bandhaḥ keyūrasaṃjñakaḥ // MinSd_97 //
GS39minsmaru:192: yoṣitpādau hṛdi nyasya karābhyāṃ dhārayet kucau /
GS39minsmaru:193: yatheṣṭaṃ tāḍayed yonau bandhaḥ samapadaḥ smṛtaḥ // MinSd_99 //
GS39minsmaru:194: pādam ekaṃ kare dhṛtvā dvitīyaṃ skandhasaṃsthitam /
GS39minsmaru:195: stanārpitakaraḥ kāmī bandhas tv ekapado hi saḥ // MinSd_100 //
GS39minsmaru:197: bhage liṅgasya saṃyogād ramate sampuṭo hi saḥ // MinSd_101 //
GS39minsmaru:199: stanalagno ramet kāmī bandhaḥ sampuṭako mataḥ // MinSd_102 //
GS39minsmaru:201: stanau dhṛtvā ramet kāmī bandhaḥ syān manmathapriyaḥ // MinSd_103 //
GS39minsmaru:203: dhṛtvā kaṇṭhaṃ ramen nārīṃ bandho 'yaṃ ratisundaraḥ // MinSd_104 //
GS39minsmaru:204: striyā ūruyugaṃ dhṛtvā karābhyāṃ pīḍayet punaḥ /
GS39minsmaru:205: kuryāc ca nirbhayāṃ kāmī bandhaḥ syād ūrupīḍanaḥ // MinSd_105 //
GS39minsmaru:207: ramate sudṛḍhaḥ kāmī smaracakraṃ prakīrtitam // MinSd_106 //
GS39minsmaru:209: ramen niḥśaṅkitaḥ kāmī bandhaḥ syān nāgapāśakaḥ // MinSd_107 //
GS39minsmaru:211: ūrdhvagaṃ ramate dorbhyāṃ bandho gaganakaḥ smṛtaḥ // MinSd_108 //
GS39minsmaru:213: kṛtvā kānto ramed āśu bandho 'yaṃ vaṃśadārakaḥ // MinSd_109 //
GS39minsmaru:214: mukhaṃ mukhe yadā bāhyaṃ bāhye jaṅghe 'pi jaṅghayoḥ /
GS39minsmaru:215: vakṣo vakṣaḥsthale dattvā bhavet sa kanakakṣayaḥ // MinSd_110 //
GS39minsmaru:217: hṛdi tatkāntahastāṃ ca bandho 'yaṃ nāgaro mataḥ // MinSd_111 //
GS39minsmaru:219: yonim āpīḍayet kāmī bandhaḥ kuliśanāmakaḥ // MinSd_112 //
GS39minsmaru:221: dhṛtvā kaṇṭhaṃ ramet kāmī bandhaḥ syāt kāmasundaraḥ // MinSd_113 //
GS39minsmaru:223: tasmād vidagdhasaṃghātaiḥ kāryā bandhāḥ prayatnataḥ // MinSd_114 //
GS39minsmaru:225: dhṛtodaro ramet kāmī bandho 'yaṃ paśunāmakaḥ // MinSd_115 //
GS39minsmaru:227: kāntaḥ kāmayate paścāt kathitas tv ekabandhakaḥ // MinSd_116 //
GS39minsmaru:228: uddhṛtya pādam ekaṃ tu bhuvi saṃsthāpya cāparam /
GS39minsmaru:229: kuḍyāśritāṃ ramet kāntāṃ bandhas traivikramo mataḥ // MinSd_117 //
GS39minsmaru:230: hṛdi saṃsthāpya pādaikaṃ bāhubhyāṃ veṣṭayed yadi /
GS39minsmaru:231: kāntaḥ kuḍyāśritāṃ nārīṃ bandho veṣṭanako mataḥ // MinSd_118 //
GS39minsmaru:233: kuḍyāśritāṃ ramet kāntāṃ bandho dolādināmakaḥ // MinSd_119 //
GS39minsmaru:235: grīvāṃ dhṛtvā ramet kāmī bandho dolāyitaḥ smṛtaḥ // MinSd_120 //
GS39minsmaru:237: pādābhyāṃ madhyam āveṣṭya bandhaḥ prālambako mataḥ // MinSd_121 //
GS39minsmaru:239: kaṭim ālolayed āśu bandho 'yaṃ haṃsalīlakaḥ // MinSd_122 //
GS39minsmaru:241: hṛdaye dattahastā ca bandho līlāsano mataḥ // MinSd_123 //
GS39minsmaru:243: yojayet kāmaśāstrajñaḥ sadyo bhuktavatīṃ tathā // MinSd_124 //
GS39minsmaru:245: tathaiva ramaṇasyāpi nārī liṅgaṃ prakarṣati // MinSd_125 //
GS39minsmaru:251: mahārāṣṭre ratā rāmāḥ strīrājye kośaleṣu ca // MinSd_128 //
GS39minsmaru:257: lubdhāś cādharapāneṣu na tu lāvaṇyavigrahāḥ // MinSd_131 //
GS39minsmaru:260: strīṇāṃ viṣayasātmyaṃ ca jñātvā maithunam ācaret /
GS39minsmaru:261: samāne sukhasampattir anyathā vai dviṣanti tāḥ // MinSd_133 //
GS39minsmaru:263: yatra strīṇāṃ ca kāṭhinyaṃ tatra nīcarato bhavet // MinSd_134 //
GS39minsmaru:265: śrūyate caiva karṇāṭe kāntayā nihataḥ patiḥ // MinSd_135 //
GS39minsmaru:269: idānīṃ yad ahaṃ vakṣye kanyāyāḥ lakṣaṇaṃ tataḥ /
GS39minsmaru:270: nirūpya lakṣaṇādīṃs tāṃ paritaḥ svīyasampadam // MinSd_138 //
GS39minsmaru:271: na kṛṣṇā nātigaurāṅgī tanvī mṛduvacās tathā /
GS39minsmaru:272: na kharvā nātidīrghā ca suvaktrā cārulocanā // MinSd_139 //
GS39minsmaru:273: kambugrīvā ca mṛdvaṅgī śyāmarukthodarī tu yā /
GS39minsmaru:275: āraktā sutarāṃ netre nakhe dantacchade 'pi ca /
GS39minsmaru:276: padmaraktādicihnaṃ ca pāṇau pāde viśeṣataḥ // MinSd_141 //
GS39minsmaru:278: bhavet kanyā praśaṃsyā sā dharmakāmārthasiddhaye // MinSd_142 //
GS39minsmaru:280: kanyā sā varjanīyā ca saivopapatikā matā // MinSd_143 //
GS39minsmaru:281: kanyā sā puṃścalī kharvā yā syāc chabalamadhyamā /
GS39minsmaru:282: pīvarā karkaśāṅgī ca piṅganetrā kace jaṭā // MinSd_144 //
GS39minsmaru:284: jaṅghāyām uttaroṣṭhe ca bibhratī lomasaṃcayam // MinSd_145 //
GS39minsmaru:285: karoti yadi vā nityaṃ bhojanaṃ vipulaṃ bahu /
GS39minsmaru:287: gaṇḍakūpe hasantī ca dantapaṅktyā tu danturā /
GS39minsmaru:288: sā vijñair varjanīyā ca sukhaiśvaryasamīhayā // MinSd_147 //
GS39minsmaru:289: tad yathā kuladvayaṃ cāpi vininditā strī yaśovibhūtiṃ ca tiraskaroti /
GS39minsmaru:290: nimagnacandreva niśāsamānā prayāti naivādaratāṃ pṛthivyām // MinSd_148 //
GS39minsmaru:293: bālā ca taruṇī prauḍhā vṛddhā bhavati nāyikā /
GS39minsmaru:294: ebhiḥ prakārair vikhyātā yuvatī nāgarī sadā // MinSd_150 //
GS39minsmaru:296: tasmāt paraṃ ca yogyā sā yāvad viṃśativatsaram // MinSd_151 //
GS39minsmaru:298: tadūrdhvam atirūḍhā syād yāvat pañcāśataṃ punaḥ // MinSd_152 //
GS39minsmaru:300: prīṇāti bālā mālādyais taruṇī vastradānataḥ // MinSd_153 //
GS39minsmaru:302: phalatāmbūlavāsobhir bālā vaśyā bhaven nṛṇām // MinSd_154 //
GS39minsmaru:304: gāḍhāliṅganacumbanaiś ca atirūḍhās tu yoṣitaḥ // MinSd_155 //
GS39minsmaru:308: nidāghaśarador bālā sevyā viṣayiṇāṃ bhavet // MinSd_157 //
GS39minsmaru:310: satataṃ sevyamānāpi bālā vardhayate balam // MinSd_158 //
GS39minsmaru:311: kṣemaṃ nayati yogyā strī vṛddhā prakurute jarām /
GS39minsmaru:312: utsāhahāniṃ vṛddhā strī diśed rogakṣayādikam // MinSd_159 //
GS39minsmaru:313: bālā ca prāṇadā proktā taruṇī prāṇahāriṇī /
GS39minsmaru:314: prauḍhā karoti vṛddhatvaṃ vṛddhā maraṇam ādiśet // MinSd_160 //
GS39minsmaru:315: āsīne lālayed bālāṃ taruṇīṃ śayane tathā /
GS39minsmaru:316: utthāne tv atirūḍhāṃ ca lālanaṃ trividhaṃ matam // MinSd_161 //
GS39minsmaru:318: madhupānaprasannā ca nartitā virahī tathā // MinSd_162 //
GS39minsmaru:320: etā vahanti sutarāṃ striyo na suratotsavam // MinSd_163 //
GS39minsmaru:322: paśor iva bhavet tasya siddhiḥ svārthaikasiddhaye // MinSd_164 //
GS39minsmaru:324: nakhadānaṃ ca ghātaś ca grahaṇaṃ kucakeśayoḥ // MinSd_165 //
GS39minsmaru:326: etad daśaprabhedaṃ hi kṣaraṇasya prakīrtitam // MinSd_166 //
GS39minsmaru:327: nārīṇāṃ mohanaṃ tāvad yāvan notkaṇṭhitā priyā /
GS39minsmaru:329: śītkāraṃ cātha huṃkāraṃ hasitaṃ ca trapākṣayaḥ /
GS39minsmaru:330: prasvinnavadanaṃ caiva vikāro 'tha bhagasya ca // MinSd_168 //
GS39minsmaru:331: buddhvā caitāni liṅgāni yoṣitāṃ surate budhaḥ /
GS39minsmaru:332: tayā tulyasukhaṃ vāñchann anurāgaṃ samācaret // MinSd_169 //
GS39minsmaru:333: puṣpaṃ mālyaṃ suvarṇaṃ ca rājataṃ taruṇīsukham /
GS39minsmaru:335: daivād yadi kadācid dhi vicchedaḥ kramaśas tadā /
GS39minsmaru:336: daśamīṃ manmathāvasthāṃ prāpnoty eva na saṃśayaḥ // MinSd_171 //
GS39minsmaru:338: unmādo vipralāpaś ca udvego vyādhir aṣṭamaḥ // MinSd_172 //
GS39minsmaru:342: satyaṃ vallabhatāṃ yāti sumadhyānāṃ ca yoṣitām // MinSd_174 //
GS39minsmaru:343: vijñaḥ sādhyāṃ yatnasādhyāṃ vacasā caiva sādhayet /
GS39minsmaru:344: sādhanaṃ kaṭhinaṃ strīṇāṃ durnirūpyā bhavanti tāḥ // MinSd_175 //
GS39minsmaru:352: etāny aphalasādhyāni liṅgāni ca samunnayet // MinSd_179 //
GS39minsmaru:354: sādhyā liṅgarthavīryas tā asādhyā sā prakīrtitā // MinSd_180 //
GS39minsmaru:361: rakṣitavyā sadā nāryaḥ sadbhir ātmaprayatnataḥ // MinSd_183 //
GS39minsmaru:362: satyapradānair madhurair vacobhiḥ saṃrakṣitavyā taruṇī sadaiva /
GS39minsmaru:363: arakṣitā cāpi kulasya nāśaṃ kuryāddhi vai bāhyajanānurāgāt // MinSd_184 //
GS39minsmaru:364: agrāmyamaṇḍanaḥ prājñaḥ śuciḥ śrīmāṃś ca gāyanaḥ /
GS39minsmaru:365: narmagoṣṭhīpraviṣṭaś ca ṣaḍguṇo nāgaro mataḥ // MinSd_185 //
GS39minsmaru:366: tyāgī vivekī kuśalaḥ kulīnaḥ kalābhivijñaḥ sumatir dhanāḍhyaḥ /
GS39minsmaru:367: bhavakṣamaḥ sarvasahaḥ sukhī ca śrīmān suśīlaḥ sa hi nāyakaḥ syāt // MinSd_186 //
GS39minsmaru:369: sakhī gopālikā ceṭī nāpitā vidhavā naṭī // MinSd_187 //
GS39minsmaru:370: sairandhrī kanyakā caiva daivajñā dūtikā matā /
GS39minsmaru:372: pravīṇā sthirabhāvā ca pragalbhā dūtikā matā /
GS39minsmaru:376: aharahar anurāgā dūtikāṃ preṣya pūrvaṃ sarabhasam upayāti kvāpi saṃketadeśe /
GS39minsmaru:377: na mīlati khalu yasyā vallabho daivayogān nigadati bharatas tāṃ nāyikāṃ vipralabdhām // MinSd_191 //
GS39minsmaru:378: yasyā ratiguṇākṛṣṭaḥ patiḥ pārśve na muñcati /
GS39minsmaru:381: dhyāyed ekamanā bhūtvā syāt sā virahiṇī matā // MinSd_193 //
GS39minsmaru:383: niḥśaṅkinī vrajati yā priyasaṃgamāya sā nāyikā khalu bhaved abhisāriketi // MinSd_194 //
GS39minsmaru:384: yā nirlajjā kṛtā gāḍhaṃ madena madanena ca /
GS39minsmaru:385: abhiyāti priyaṃ sābhisārikā kathitā budhaiḥ // MinSd_195 //
GS39minsmaru:386: ajñānān na gato yasyāḥ saṃketam ucitapriyaḥ /
GS39minsmaru:388: nirasto manyunā kāntaḥ samartho hi yayā punaḥ /
GS39minsmaru:389: avasthitā vinā tena kupitā kathitā budhaiḥ // MinSd_197 //
GS39minsmaru:393: durvāramanmathaśarajvaravepamānām utkaṇṭhitāṃ vadati tāṃ bharataḥ kavīndraḥ // MinSd_199 //
GS39minsmaru:399: mantro gurumukhāl labdhaḥ sidhyaty atra na saṃśayaḥ // MinSd_202 //
GS39minsmaru:400: tricāmuṇḍe iti padaṃ tataḥ kvanu kvanu smṛtam /
GS39minsmaru:401: tataḥ padaṃ chanu chanu svakīyaṃ vaśam ānayet // MinSd_203 //
GS39minsmaru:405: saptābhimantritaṃ puṣpaṃ yaiva gṛhṇāti sā vaśā // MinSd_205 //
GS39minsmaru:407: raktaṃ rateś ca lepena vaśīkuryur manīṣiṇaḥ // MinSd_206 //
GS39minsmaru:410: haritālaṃ manaḥśilā raktacandanam etat sarvaṃ cūrṇīkṛtya /
GS39minsmaru:411: puṣpeṇa saha yasyāḥ śirasi dīyate sā paśuvad vaśyā bhavati /
GS39minsmaru:412: pecakasya hṛdayaṃ kuṅkumena saha sampiṣya tilakaṃ kuryāt tena loko vaśyo bhavati // MinSd_208 //
GS39minsmaru:413: aśvagandhā vacā kuṣṭhaṃ balā nāgabalā tathā /
GS39minsmaru:417: nūnaṃ tasya pralepena liṅgaṃ lauhopamaṃ bhavet /
GS39minsmaru:420: kṣīreṇa kamalaṃ piṣṭvā salilaṃ guṭikākṛtam // MinSd_212 //
GS39minsmaru:421: upasthe nihitaṃ kuryāt prakīrṇam api ca kvacit /
GS39minsmaru:423: baddhaṃ kaṭitaṭe bījaṃ vibandhaṃ kurute dhruvam /
GS39minsmaru:424: saptaparṇasya bījaṃ hi stambhayec chukram ātmagam // MinSd_214 //
GS39minsmaru:426: karañjabījaṃ madhyasthaṃ samūlaṃ bandhayed bījam // MinSd_215 //
GS39minsmaru:428: pādatale lepenāvaśyaṃ bījastambhaṃ nayati puṃsām // MinSd_216 //
GS39minsmaru:430: cūrṇaṃ nābhivilepād vīryastambhaṃ karoty avaśyam // MinSd_217 //
GS39minsmaru:432: mukhe kṣiptam idaṃ bījaṃ stambhayaty eva niścitam // MinSd_218 //
GS39minsmaru:433: kuryād ādau paricchedaṃ mardanaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ /
GS39minsmaru:434: saptāhaṃ bhāvayen māṣaṃ nistuṣaṃ vidalaṃ tataḥ // MinSd_219 //
GS39minsmaru:436: tatpaścād ghanabhraṣṭaṃ ca bhakṣayet kṣīrasādhitam // MinSd_220 //
GS39minsmaru:439: pādāṅguṣṭhena bhūmau tāṃ pīḍayet tu samāhitaḥ // MinSd_222 //
GS39minsmaru:443: samṛddham ābaddham abhinnadhairyaḥ ślatho 'pi dīrghaṃ ramate rate // MinSd_224 //
GS39minsmaru:444: pāradaṃ ṭaṅkanaṃ vyoṣā kākamācī tathā madhu /
GS39minsmaru:445: kṣiptaliṅgaś ciraṃ nārīṃ drāvayed ramaṇaḥ sadā // MinSd_225 //
GS39minsmaru:446: tumbīpatraṃ ca lodhraṃ ca samabhāgena lepayet /
GS39minsmaru:451: yathāvibhūtidānaṃ hi brahmacarye ca tiṣṭhati // MinSd_228 //
GS39minsmaru:452: kṛtvādau tatra śuddhiṃ tu punaḥ kṣetre śubhekṣaṇe /
GS39minsmaru:453: sūryodayapradoṣābhyāṃ viśeṣāc ca svayaṃ balī // MinSd_229 //
GS39minsmaru:454: kṛtvā caikamanā vijño yadi bījaṃ vimuñcati /
GS39minsmaru:455: sūte māsodaye nūnaṃ guṇavantaṃ yaśasvinam // MinSd_230 //
